title: Red mullet with baked tomatoes
description: Baking fish is an easy way to reduce calories without compromising on flavour. Serve alongside baked  tomatoes for a healthy evening meal.As part of an Intermittent diet plan, 1 serving provides 2 of your 6 daily vegetable portions and 248 kcal.
ingredients: 375g/13oz mixed red and yellow cherry tomatoes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
